box1.desc:
We believe that the heart of any successful business lies in its people. Layers is built on the foundation of enhancing employee experiences, fostering engagement, and driving productivity.

With our innovative features and user-friendly interface, we aim to revolutionize the way you manage your HR functions, allowing you to focus on what truly matters – your employees.

services.title: Our Value-added Services.
services.s1: We understand that managing human resources involves more than just basic functions, which is why we have developed a range of specialized services tailored to meet the unique needs of your organization.

s1.name: Ford Prefect
s1.comment: Thanks to Layers, our employee onboarding experience has become seamless and efficient. The app’s features have saved us time and improved new hire engagement.
